metadata.description: This is the latest work from celebrated political satirist Martin Rowson. His work has appeared regularly in The Guardian, The Times, The Independent on Sunday, The Daily Mirror, The Spectator and The Morning Star, as well as many other publications. He won the Cartoon Art Trust s Political Cartoonist of the Year Award in 2000 and 2004, the Political Cartoon Society s Cartoon of the Year in 2003 and 2007 and was their Cartoonist of Year in 2010.
metadata.name: The Pen is Mightier than the Word
